name: Dreamscape (itch) (Gameheads)
description:
Dreamscape is a top-down battle-arena game that takes a young girl through her battles of boredom and imagination. Locked in from summer fun due to chores and outside events, Jojo has only home and chores to keep her company. A light-hearted adventure through the worlds of her imagination and reality awaits.

  • How to Play:
    • Controller: 
      • Left Analog-stick for movement D-Pad for alternative movement 
      • “A” for button prompts 
      • “A” for down attack 
      • “B” for right attack 
      • “Y” for up attack 
      • “X” for left attack 
    • Keyboard: 
      • WASD for movement 
      • Arrow keys for alternative movement 
      • “K” for down attack 
      • “L” for right attack 
      • “I” for up attack 
      • “J” for left attack
